metadata.name: Suspicious Splwow64 Without Params
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious Splwow64.exe process without any command line parameters

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\splwow64.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('splwow64.exe')))

output.summary: Detects suspicious Splwow64.exe process without any command line parameters
